sentences.sContent: This should be wonderful news for... well, for all women born in 1979 and 1980, who can rejoice in the realisation that they are – or are about to be – at their peak.
sentences.sContent_eng: This should be wonderful news for... well, for all women born in 1979 and 1980, who can rejoice in the realisation that they are – or are about to be – at their peak.
sentences.sCn: 这对所有在1979 和1980 年出生的女人来说应该是一个很棒的消息，她们会为自己正处于或即将处于人生的黄金时刻而感到高兴。

words.tran: 使欣喜（rejoice的ing形式）；感到高兴
